about_the_game:
This DLC package contains Gold Rooms for hosts. These rooms add 5 mins of auto prestige to the 15minute timer for your entire group, along with a few personal bonuses.

Personal bonuses include:
  • Enables auto-leveling to classes(when not in Automatic AFK Prestige mode
  • Auto equipping best gear (unless the gear needs upgraded to be better)
  • Pet talent crafting resource applying to all trashing options
  • Class evolve's will now queue if you have more than one class ready to evolve.
detailed_description:
This DLC package contains Gold Rooms for hosts. These rooms add 5 mins of auto prestige to the 15minute timer for your entire group, along with a few personal bonuses.

Personal bonuses include:
  • Enables auto-leveling to classes(when not in Automatic AFK Prestige mode
  • Auto equipping best gear (unless the gear needs upgraded to be better)
  • Pet talent crafting resource applying to all trashing options
  • Class evolve's will now queue if you have more than one class ready to evolve.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.x
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or better Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel shader 2.0, 128Mb ram
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Version of Either OS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or better Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel shader 2.0, 128Mb ram
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: ClickRaid - Gold Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or better Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX11 Compatible Cards
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or better Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX11 Compatible Cards
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Higher tier supporter package with Gold Rooms.
